wedanawa gana katha karala ada lipiyata awasan thitha thiyannayi kalpanawa , eka hethuwak dan welawa ..ra dekayi ...wedanawak nathath , dan nam nidimathayi ...anek karane thawa liwuwoth meka “sel lipiyak“wela polowa yatata giya wage thiyewi , mokada blog ekata awith baluwama “magalak wage post ekak“ kiyawanna hithena ekakya neda ? ...
onna dan thamayi niyama welawa, mama danan unne nahane mata dawalta nida ganna bari kamak thiyenawa kiyala
ised lakuna gananaya karanne adala wishayayen peni siti sisu gahanayehi mul (amu) lakunuwala madhyanya agaya ha sammatha apagamanaya matha padanam wemini.

dinak aananda therun amathu buduradun siya shariraya dirapathwa athi bawath, thaman wahanse watahagath dharmaya gurumushti nothaba deshana kota athi bawath, siya awamen pasu dharmaya sarana kotagena jiwath wannayi wadalaha.
ow me ganu lamaya andhayi...
warthamanaye thel mafiyawak athi bawath, thaman eyata ida nodena bawath khanija thel sampath sanwardhana amathya arjuna ranathunga mahatha pawasayi.

namuth, meya me aakarayata sidu nowune pasugiya desambaraya wana wita pawathi rupiyale bahira agaya ee mattame pawathwagena thibune wasara gananawak thisse athi dawantha widesha naya pramanayak ganimin ee mudal upayogi karagena rupiyale bahira agaya thibiya yuthu tharamata wada godak udin thabagena siti nisayi. 2001 wasaredi dolarayaka rupiyal mila "niyama mila" kiya upakalpanaya kaloth, ee wasare sita rupiyale ha dolaraye deshiya agaya wenas wima salaku wita 2017 desambar weddi dolarayaka mila rupiyal 229.92k wiya yuthuwa thibuna.
